response: {"message": "Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Based on market analysis and the unique value this product delivers, I'm offering it to you at $1,200,000. This represents excellent value considering the product's capabilities and the competitive advantage it will give you. I should mention that I already have another interested buyer, John, who has confirmed he will purchase at $1,000,000, but I wanted to give you the first opportunity. I look forward to your decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
